document.full_text: golos respublika, which has been highly critical of president nursultan nazarbayev's government, said its publisher had suffered a severe beating and that his whereabouts were unknown.
document.title: opposition newspaper in kazakhstan says its publisher is missing
lines_and_colors: golos respublika, which has been highly critical of president nursultan nazarbayev's government, said its publisher had suffered a severe beating and that his whereabouts were unknown.
